definition: the act or process of drawing up plans or layouts for some project or enterprise
details:
noun
- the act or process of drawing up plans or layouts for some project or enterprise
- an act of formulating a program for a definite course of action
= example: an act of formulating a program for a definite course of action
- the cognitive process of thinking about what you will do in the event of something happening
= example: the cognitive process of thinking about what you will do in the event of something happening
= synonyms: provision, preparation
